${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:AbsolutePower.NAME: Absolute Power
${modID}:AbsolutePower.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E]  every time an attack's damage ends in a 9.

${modID}:Agami.NAME: Agami
${modID}:Agami.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Wait !${modID}:M2!. NL On ${modID}:expiry, convert the enemy's ${modID}:LV into ${modID}:KR.
${modID}:Agami.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Wait !${modID}:M2!. NL On ${modID}:expiry, give the enemy #b%s ${modID}:LV and convert the enemy's ${modID}:LV into ${modID}:KR.

${modID}:AncientStrike.NAME: Ancient Strike
${modID}:AncientStrike.DESCRIPTION: Give the enemy !M! Artifact. Deal !D! damage per Artifact stack.

${modID}:AnnoyingDog.NAME: Annoying Dog
${modID}:AnnoyingDog.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Critical: Temporarily ${modID}:Unseal this card.

${modID}:BadMemory.NAME: Bad Memory
${modID}:BadMemory.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP. NL Add a *Freak *Bullet to your hand.
${modID}:BadMemory.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP. NL Add a *Freak *Bullet+ to your hand.

${modID}:BalletShoes.NAME: Ballet Shoes
${modID}:BalletShoes.DESCRIPTION: On odd hand size, NL play the middle card in your hand !M! times and ${modID}:Trap it once.

${modID}:Blooky.NAME: Blooky
${modID}:Blooky.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain !B! Block. Your next card this turn is ${modID}:Ghostly.
${modID}:Blooky.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain !B! Block. Your next two cards this turn are ${modID}:Ghostly.

${modID}:BreakFree.NAME: Break Free
${modID}:BreakFree.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Unseal all cards in your hand. NL Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Perseverable.

${modID}:BurntPan.NAME: Burnt Pan
${modID}:BurntPan.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Critical: Gain ${modID}:Temp_HP equal to the unblocked damage dealt.

${modID}:ButterscotchPie.NAME: Butterscotch Pie
${modID}:ButterscotchPie.DESCRIPTION: Convert your Block into ${modID}:Temp_HP. Keep up to !M! Block. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Chill.NAME: Chill
${modID}:Chill.DESCRIPTION: Retain. Costs 1 less [E] NL for each ${modID}:Wasted *Energy last turn. NL Deal !D! damage.

${modID}:Cleave.NAME: Cleave
${modID}:Cleave.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Convert this card's ${modID}:XP to ${modID}:LV.

${modID}:CroquetRoll.NAME: Croquet Roll
${modID}:CroquetRoll.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL If *Exhausted, gain !M! ${modID}:Temp_HP and add a *Mallet into your hand.
${modID}:CroquetRoll.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL If *Exhausted, gain !M! ${modID}:Temp_HP and add a *Mallet+ into your hand.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: This is cut content! I can't play it.

${modID}:OLDCriticalStrike.NAME: Critical Strike
${modID}:OLDCriticalStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Critical: Deal double damage.

${modID}:DateGoneWrong.NAME: Date Gone Wrong
${modID}:DateGoneWrong.DESCRIPTION: If ${modID}:Threatened, NL gain [E] [E]. NL Put the card with the highest ${modID}:XP into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:DateGoneWrong.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If ${modID}:Threatened, NL gain [E] [E] [E]. NL Put the card with the highest ${modID}:XP into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:DogShrine.NAME: Dog Shrine
${modID}:DogShrine.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust !M! card. NL Draw cards equal to its ${modID}:XP.
${modID}:DogShrine.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust !M! cards. NL Draw cards equal to their ${modID}:XP.

${modID}:DontNeedFriends.NAME: Don't Need Friends
${modID}:DontNeedFriends.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Add a *I'm... to your hand.

${modID}:Dream.NAME: Dream
${modID}:Dream.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Draft !M! ${modID}:Nightmare. NL ${modID}:Draft !M! ${modID}:Dream for each unique debuff the enemy has.

${modID}:Duel.NAME: Dual!
${modID}:Duel.DESCRIPTION: Put ALL ${modID}:Strikes from your draw pile to your hand. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:EchoFlower.NAME: Echo Flower
${modID}:EchoFlower.DESCRIPTION: While in your hand, this card is a copy of the previous card you played this turn.
${modID}:EchoFlower.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: While in your hand, this card is an upgraded copy of the previous card you played this turn.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I must play another card first.

${modID}:Evolve.NAME: Evolve
${modID}:Evolve.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! ${modID}:LV whenever you play a card.

${modID}:Execute.NAME: Execute
${modID}:Execute.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL Choose 1 card to give !M! ${modID}:inherent ${modID}:XP.

${modID}:OLDExpertise.NAME: Expertise
${modID}:OLDExpertise.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL ${modID}:Critical: Choose a card .
${modID}:OLDExpertise.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Give up to 1 card !M! ${modID}:XP.

${modID}:FavouriteNumber.NAME: Favourite Number
${modID}:FavouriteNumber.DESCRIPTION: Your next attack this turn is ${modID}:Demonified. Deal !D! damage.

${modID}:FistsFirst.NAME: Fists First
${modID}:FistsFirst.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Add an *Void to the top of your draw pile.

${modID}:FlurryOfKnives.NAME: Flurry Of Knives
${modID}:FlurryOfKnives.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times. NL Can be Upgraded any number of times.

${modID}:FreakBullet.NAME: Freak Bullet
${modID}:FreakBullet.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL This card always has at least !M! ${modID}:inherent ${modID}:XP.

${modID}:FriendsForever.NAME: Friends Forever
${modID}:FriendsForever.DESCRIPTION: Prevent the next time you would lose ${modID}:LV. NL Deal !D! damage.
${modID}:FriendsForever.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Prevent the next !M! times you would lose ${modID}:LV. NL Deal !D! damage.

${modID}:GladDummy.NAME: Glad Dummy
${modID}:GladDummy.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Summon an ${modID}:SoulBound ${modID}:Glad_Dummy. NL It has !M! HP.

${modID}:Grillbys.NAME: Grillby's
${modID}:Grillbys.DESCRIPTION: Add a *Ketchup to your hand. NL Take a ${modID}:Sip of all your potions. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Grillbys.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a *Ketchup+ to your hand. NL Take an upgraded ${modID}:Sip of all your potions. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:HiddenDeep.NAME: Hidden Deep
${modID}:HiddenDeep.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Put !M! Unplayable or ${modID}:Trapped card from your draw or discard pile into your hand.
${modID}:HiddenDeep.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Put !M! Unplayable or ${modID}:Trapped cards from your draw or discard pile into your hand.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Select a card to move to your hand.
Select cards to move to your hand.

${modID}:HugItOff.NAME: Hug It Off
${modID}:HugItOff.DESCRIPTION: Give EVERYONE !B! Block. NL ${modID}:Wait !${modID}:M2!. NL On ${modID}:expiry, draw !M! card.
${modID}:HugItOff.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Give EVERYONE !B! Block. NL ${modID}:Wait !${modID}:M2!. NL On ${modID}:expiry, draw !M! cards.

${modID}:Im.NAME: I'm...
${modID}:Im.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL While in hand, you cannot play Attacks.

${modID}:ItsAMatch.NAME: It's a match!
${modID}:ItsAMatch.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Steal ${modID}:matching buffs. The enemy ${modID}:steals ${modID}:matching debuffs from you.
${modID}:ItsAMatch.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Steal ${modID}:matching buffs. ALL enemies ${modID}:steal ${modID}:matching debuffs from you.

${modID}:KillWithKindness.NAME: Kill With Kindness
${modID}:KillWithKindness.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you buff an enemy, it gains !M! Vulnerable.

${modID}:LevelUp.NAME: Level Up
${modID}:LevelUp.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Upgrade ALL your cards in your hand with ${modID}:XP for the rest of combat.
${modID}:LevelUp.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Upgrade ALL your cards in your deck with ${modID}:XP for the rest of combat.

${modID}:MadDummy.NAME: Mad Dummy
${modID}:MadDummy.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Summon an ${modID}:SoulBound ${modID}:Mad_Dummy. NL It has !M! HP.

${modID}:NiceCream.NAME: Nice Cream
${modID}:NiceCream.DESCRIPTION: Prevent the next time you would ${modID}:Waste *Energy. NL Gain !M! ${modID}:LV per ${modID}:Wasted *Energy saved.

${modID}:Plead.NAME: Plead
${modID}:Plead.DESCRIPTION: If you have Block, give your Block to the enemy. NL That enemy deals less damage for their ${modID}:LV this turn.
${modID}:Plead.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If you have Block, give your Block to ALL enemies. NL ALL enemies deal less damage for their ${modID}:LV this turn.

${modID}:Pounce.NAME: Pounce
${modID}:Pounce.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Wait !${modID}:M2!. NL On ${modID}:expiry, deal !M! damage. NL Deals double damage if the target does not intend to attack.

${modID}:Prarabdha.NAME: Prarabdha
${modID}:Prarabdha.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! ${modID}:LV. NL Apply !M! ${modID}:KR. NL If ${modID}:Threatened, ${modID}:Steal !M! HP from ALL enemies.

${modID}:RememberBravery.NAME: Remember Bravery
${modID}:RememberBravery.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you would lose ${modID}:LV, a random card in your hand gains equivalent ${modID}:XP.
${modID}:RememberBravery.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you would lose ${modID}:LV, a random card in your hand gains equivalent ${modID}:XP.

${modID}:RememberKindness.NAME: Remember Kindness
${modID}:RememberKindness.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an enemy gains Block, it gains !M! Weak.

${modID}:RememberPatience.NAME: Remember Patience
${modID}:RememberPatience.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you have !${modID}:M2! or more cards in your hand, Retain !M! cards this turn.

${modID}:RewindStrike.NAME: Rewind Strike
${modID}:RewindStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Revert the enemy to their previous turn. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:RewindStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. Deal !D! damage. NL Revert the enemy to their previous turn. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Rock.NAME: Rock
${modID}:Rock.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL This card always has at least !M! ${modID}:inherent ${modID}:XP. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:OLDSanchita.NAME: OLDSanchita
${modID}:OLDSanchita.DESCRIPTION: Apply !${modID}:M2! ${modID}:KR to a random enemy X times, where X is the amount of ${modID}:Wasted *Energy spent last turn.

${modID}:Ruins.NAME: Ruins
${modID}:Ruins.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Wait !${modID}:M2!. NL On ${modID}:expiry, deal !M! damage. NL At the start of turn increase damage dealt by 5.

${modID}:Sanchita.NAME: Sanchita
${modID}:Sanchita.DESCRIPTION: EVERYONE gains !B! Block. NL EVERYONE gains !M! ${modID}:Temp_HP. NL EVERYONE gains !${modID}:M2! ${modID}:KR.

${modID}:ScalesOfJustice.NAME: Scales Of Justice
${modID}:ScalesOfJustice.DESCRIPTION: Gain a *Left *Scale or NL Gain a *Right *Scale. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:ScalesOfJustice.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain a *Left *Scale and NL Gain a *Right *Scale. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:LeftScale.NAME: Left Scale
${modID}:LeftScale.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP. Deal damage equal to your missing HP. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:RightScale.NAME: Right Scale
${modID}:RightScale.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! ${modID}:Temp_HP. Deal damage equal to your ${modID}:Temp_HP. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:SelfReflection.NAME: Self Reflection
${modID}:SelfReflection.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL Gain !M! ${modID}:Vitality. NL Gain !M! ${modID}:Mercied.

${modID}:SlackOff.NAME: Slack Off
${modID}:SlackOff.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL This card starts with !M! ${modID}:added ${modID}:XP. ${modID}:XP decreases Attack damage for this card.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL This card starts with !M! ${modID}:added ${modID}:XP. ${modID}:XP increases Attack damage for this card while you have ${modID}:Mercied.

${modID}:Sleep.NAME: Sleep
${modID}:Sleep.DESCRIPTION: Increase the time of ALL ${modID}:Countdowns by !M!. NL Upgrade ALL ${modID}:Countdowns. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Sleep.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Increase the time of ALL ${modID}:Countdowns by !M!. NL Upgrade ALL ${modID}:Countdowns.

${modID}:SnowedInn.NAME: Snowed Inn
${modID}:SnowedInn.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! ${modID}:Temp_HP. NL Trigger ALL of your ${modID}:Countdowns.

${modID}:Spare.NAME: Spare
${modID}:Spare.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Spare the enemy. NL They gain ${modID}:Spared. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Spare.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Spare the enemy, and gain gold rewards if you flee. NL They gain ${modID}:Spared. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:SpecialDeal.NAME: Specil Deal
${modID}:SpecialDeal.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL EVERYONE gains !M! ${modID}:NEO. NL EVERYONE gains !M! Artifact. NL Gain ${modID}:1997 gold.

${modID}:Steal.NAME: Steal
${modID}:Steal.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Steal ALL enemies' Block and buffs. NL ${modID}:Steal !M! HP from ALL enemies.

${modID}:ThunderingRage.NAME: Thundering Rage
${modID}:ThunderingRage.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this kills an enemy, gain !M! ${modID}:Overcome.

${modID}:Tinker.NAME: Tinker
${modID}:Tinker.DESCRIPTION: Give the enemy !M! Frail. NL Give the enemy !M! ${modID}:NEO. NL Give the enemy !B! Block.

${modID}:ToAsh.NAME: To Ash
${modID}:ToAsh.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if every card in your hand is an Skill. NL Apply !M! ${modID}:KR.

${modID}:TornNotebook.NAME: Torn Notebook
${modID}:TornNotebook.DESCRIPTION: The next !M! times you lose HP, gain 1 Buffer. NL ${modID}:Critical: Gain !${modID}:M2! Buffer.

${modID}:Twirl.NAME: Twirl
${modID}:Twirl.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL ${modID}:Critical: Retain !M! card this turn, NL and upgrade it for the rest of combat.

${modID}:VineBloom.NAME: Vine Bloom
${modID}:VineBloom.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL Give the enemy !M! Thorns.

${modID}:WakeUp.NAME: Wake Up
${modID}:WakeUp.DESCRIPTION: Scry !M!. NL Exhaust all Unplayable or ${modID}:Trapped cards discarded. NL Gain !B! Block for each card exhausted.

${modID}:DuplicationCocktail.NAME: Duplication Cocktail
${modID}:DuplicationCocktail.DESCRIPTION: Your next card that costs !${modID}:M2! or less is played twice. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:EntropicCocktail.NAME: Entropic Cocktail
${modID}:EntropicCocktail.DESCRIPTION: A random one of your potions turns into a new potion. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:EntropicCocktail.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Each of your potions turns into a new potion. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:FairyCocktail.NAME: Fairy Cocktail
${modID}:FairyCocktail.DESCRIPTION: Heal to !M!% of your Max HP and discard your Fairy Potion. NL Exhaust.
